skill.name: deployment-audit-skill
skill.description: Use DigitalOcean MCP and related tools to check deployment health, crash logs, environment consistency, and runtime issues for Unite-Hub / Synthex. Use when diagnosing deployment failures or verifying readiness.
skill.summary: Use DigitalOcean MCP and related tools to check deployment health, crash logs, environment consisten...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill with no executable code. Contains only guidance for using DigitalOcean CLI tools and MCP for deployment auditing. No network calls, no script execution, no file writes.

content.value_statement: Deployment issues cause downtime and lost revenue. This skill audits DigitalOcean and Vercel deployments to identify crash logs, environment mismatches, and runtime problems before they impact users.
actual_capabilities: Retrieve crash logs from DigitalOcean using doctl CLI commands
Verify environment variable consistency across local, Vercel, and DigitalOcean
Validate Supabase and Stripe key configurations
Run build verification to catch TypeScript errors and missing dependencies
Check runtime logs for memory spikes, slow endpoints, and crash patterns
limitations: Requires DigitalOcean CLI (doctl) and MCP access to DigitalOcean services
Cannot modify environment variables or fix issues automatically
Cannot access deployment dashboards outside of CLI commands
Limited to reading logs and validating configurations

use_cases.title: Diagnose deployment failures
use_cases.description: Quickly retrieve and analyze crash logs from DigitalOcean apps to identify root causes of deployment failures.

use_cases.title: Validate environment consistency
use_cases.description: Compare environment variables across local, staging, and production to catch configuration drift before it causes outages.

use_cases.title: Monitor deployment health
use_cases.description: Run health checks to verify Supabase URLs, Stripe keys, and API endpoints are correctly configured and responding.

prompt_templates.title: Check crash logs
prompt_templates.prompt: Use doctl to list all apps and retrieve crash logs for [app-name]. Check for restart patterns and error messages.

prompt_templates.title: Verify environment
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare environment variables in .env.local against Vercel and DigitalOcean app spec. Flag any mismatches in required variables.

prompt_templates.title: Validate build
prompt_templates.prompt: Run npm build and check for TypeScript errors, missing dependencies, or route compilation issues.

prompt_templates.title: Full health audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a complete deployment health audit: check crash logs, verify environment consistency, validate Supabase and Stripe keys, and report findings.

output_examples.input: Run deployment health audit for Synthex production
output: Crash Logs: 3 restart events in last 24h - all caused by memory limit exceeded on component 'api-worker'
Environment Variables: All 7 required variables match across local, Vercel, and DigitalOcean
Build: Success - no TypeScript errors, all routes compiled
Supabase: URL and anon key validated - connection successful
Stripe: Using test keys in production - MISMATCH DETECTED

best_practices: Run deployment audit before any production release to catch issues early
Check environment consistency immediately after adding new environment variables
Document recurring crash patterns to identify underlying code issues
anti_patterns: Only checking deployment health after users report problems
Assuming environment variables are consistent without verification
Ignoring repeated restart events - they indicate deeper issues

faq.question: What platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: DigitalOcean Apps and Vercel deployments. Requires doctl CLI installed and configured.

faq.question: How detailed are the crash logs?
faq.answer: Retrieves full error traces and stack dumps from DigitalOcean logs with restart event filtering.

faq.question: Can this skill fix issues it finds?
faq.answer: No, this skill only audits and reports issues. Fixes require manual intervention or separate tools.

faq.question: Is my deployment data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill only reads logs and configuration data using read-only CLI commands.

faq.question: What if doctl is not installed?
faq.answer: The skill will report that doctl is unavailable. Install from DigitalOcean documentation.

faq.question: How is this different from monitoring tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides on-demand audits with CLI access. Use with monitoring tools for comprehensive coverage.
